item.description:
Dear Member,

How are you?

Hope you enjoy the winter and snow. I think we have enough this year

The Spring and Ester both are coming soon. I have a thought, maybe we can take a walk after meetup

 

Hope you can join us and you are always welcome to bring your friends and family

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the second building on the right when you drive into condo, you can park with visitor parking sign. You can call my cell at 617-223-7166
item.name: Westborough Spirituality March Meetup
